title: 77 Shadow Street  Dean Koontz

The second owner suffered a worse tragedy in 1935, when his house manager murdered him, his family, and the entire live-in staffÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¦. Craftsmen and laborers working on renovations disappear or go madÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¦. For years, the Pendleton is a happy place, until a bad turn comes againÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¦.
